snippet.title: Hoverloop - Major Update Trailer
snippet.description:
We are delighted to release upon the universe, our modern day colosseum: Hoverloop.

Drone gladiators from around the galaxy 
come online to battle for glory in the Hoverloop arena, 
risking everything in the process.

The crowds chant their names,
revel in their victories,
and delight in their failure.

While we reward the champions with fame and fortune,
Losers are shunned and humiliated!

Battle your rivals for glory
in the Hoverloop arena.

Steam & Xbox Release: Fall 2019
https://www.not-a-company.com/
https://twitter.com/HoverloopNAC
https://www.facebook.com/Hoverloop/


Steam Early Access: https://store.steampowered.com/app/613620/Hoverloop/
